body: Hello, I am trying to work through a simple exercise but I have hit a roadblock; I am able to run the attached IDF simulation in energyplus, but when I try to replicate it through Honeybee, so that I can output some graphs, I receive the above error. I am very new to both programs, and any assistance would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
topic: Solution exception:'str' object has no attribute 'name'
